title: enthavanE gOpi
sahitya:
enthavanE gOpi ninna kanda enthavanE gOpi


caraNam 1    madagaja gamaneyu idirige bandare edebadi muTTuvudidEnu canda
    caraNam 2    sokkinindali bandu tekkeyoL piDivanu cikkavanEniva Dhakka gOvinda
    caraNam 3    celuva purandara viTTalarAyanu olisi ramisidanu lalaneyarellara
